mapper.select: select * from notify where notify_receiver=#{notifyReceiver} order by notify_date

SELECT n.*, c.club_name, m.member_name FROM notify n JOIN club_member cm ON n.notify_receiver = cm.club_member_id JOIN club c ON cm.club_no = c.club_no JOIN member m ON cm.club_member_id = m.member_id WHERE n.notify_receiver = #{notifyReceiver} ORDER BY n.notify_date DESC
